msg: MAPREDUCE-4138. Reduce memory usage of counters due to non-static nested classes.

author: ashish
msg: Bug fix - OFBIZ-4732 - Not able to add Order Item Type for PO while adding item to existing PO.
If we are creating PO then user can add order item type from show cart screen, so there should be an option to add order item type while adding item to existing PO on edit item screen.
